featuredArticle.title: Breakthrough Alzheimer's Treatment Shows 70% Cognitive Improvement in Trials
featuredArticle.excerpt: A revolutionary Alzheimer's treatment has shown unprecedented results in Phase 3 clinical trials, with patients demonstrating 70% improvement in cognitive function. The FDA is fast-tracking approval, offering hope to millions of families.
